data.textUthmani: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّآ [Indeed, We] أَرْسَلْنَا [[We] sent] نُوحًا [Nuh] إِلَىٰ [to] قَوْمِهِۦٓ [his people] أَنْ [that] أَنذِرْ [Warn] قَوْمَكَ [your people] مِن [from] قَبْلِ [before] أَن [[that]] يَأْتِيَهُمْ [comes to them] عَذَابٌ [a punishment] أَلِيمٌۭ [painful]
data.transliteration: Inna arsalna noohan ilaqawmihi an anthir qawmaka min qabli an ya/tiyahum AAathabunaleem

data.textUthmani: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] يَـٰقَوْمِ [O my people] إِنِّى [Indeed, I am] لَكُمْ [to you] نَذِيرٌۭ [a warner] مُّبِينٌ [clear]
data.transliteration: Qala ya qawmi innee lakum natheerunmubeen

data.textUthmani: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
data.wordByWord: أَنِ [That] ٱعْبُدُوا۟ [Worship] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] وَٱتَّقُوهُ [and fear Him] وَأَطِيعُونِ [and obey me]
data.transliteration: Ani oAAbudoo Allaha wattaqoohuwaateeAAoon

data.textUthmani: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
data.wordByWord: يَغْفِرْ [He will forgive] لَكُم [for you] مِّن [[of]] ذُنُوبِكُمْ [your sins] وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ [and give you respite] إِلَىٰٓ [for] أَجَلٍۢ [a term] مُّسَمًّى ۚ [specified] إِنَّ [Indeed] أَجَلَ [(the) term] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] إِذَا [when] جَآءَ [it comes] لَا [not] يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ [is delayed] لَوْ [if] كُنتُمْ [you] تَعْلَمُونَ [know]
data.transliteration: Yaghfir lakum min thunoobikumwayu-akhkhirkum ila ajalin musamman inna ajala Allahiitha jaa la yu-akhkharu law kuntumtaAAlamoon

data.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] إِنِّى [Indeed, I] دَعَوْتُ [invited] قَوْمِى [my people] لَيْلًۭا [night] وَنَهَارًۭا [and day]
data.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee daAAawtu qawmeelaylan wanahara

data.textUthmani: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًا
data.wordByWord: فَلَمْ [But not] يَزِدْهُمْ [increased them] دُعَآءِىٓ [my invitation] إِلَّا [except] فِرَارًۭا [(in) flight]
data.transliteration: Falam yazidhum duAAa-ee illafirara

data.textUthmani: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًا
data.wordByWord: وَإِنِّى [And indeed, I] كُلَّمَا [every time] دَعَوْتُهُمْ [I invited them] لِتَغْفِرَ [that You may forgive] لَهُمْ [them] جَعَلُوٓا۟ [they put] أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ [their fingers] فِىٓ [in] ءَاذَانِهِمْ [their ears] وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ [and covered themselves] ثِيَابَهُمْ [(with) their garments] وَأَصَرُّوا۟ [and persisted] وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ [and were arrogant] ٱسْتِكْبَارًۭا [(with) pride]
data.transliteration: Wa-innee kullama daAAawtuhumlitaghfira lahum jaAAaloo asabiAAahum fee athanihimwastaghshaw thiyabahum waasarroo wastakbarooistikbara

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] إِنِّى [indeed, I] دَعَوْتُهُمْ [invited them] جِهَارًۭا [publicly]
data.transliteration: Thumma innee daAAawtuhum jihara

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] إِنِّىٓ [indeed, I] أَعْلَنتُ [announced] لَهُمْ [to them] وَأَسْرَرْتُ [and I confided] لَهُمْ [to them] إِسْرَارًۭا [secretly]
data.transliteration: Thumma innee aAAlantu lahum waasrartu lahumisrara

data.textUthmani: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
data.wordByWord: فَقُلْتُ [Then I said] ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ [Ask forgiveness] رَبَّكُمْ [(from) your Lord] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] كَانَ [is] غَفَّارًۭا [Oft-Forgiving]
data.transliteration: Faqultu istaghfiroo rabbakum innahu kanaghaffara

data.textUthmani: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
data.wordByWord: يُرْسِلِ [He will send down] ٱلسَّمَآءَ [(rain from) the sky] عَلَيْكُم [upon you] مِّدْرَارًۭا [(in) abundance]
data.transliteration: Yursili assamaa AAalaykummidrara

data.textUthmani: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَـٰرًا
data.wordByWord: وَيُمْدِدْكُم [And provide you] بِأَمْوَٰلٍۢ [with wealth] وَبَنِينَ [and children] وَيَجْعَل [and make] لَّكُمْ [for you] جَنَّـٰتٍۢ [gardens] وَيَجْعَل [and make] لَّكُمْ [for you] أَنْهَـٰرًۭا [rivers]
data.transliteration: Wayumdidkum bi-amwalin wabaneenawayajAAal lakum jannatin wayajAAal lakum anhara

data.textUthmani: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
data.wordByWord: مَّا [What] لَكُمْ [(is) for you] لَا [not] تَرْجُونَ [you attribute] لِلَّهِ [to Allah] وَقَارًۭا [grandeur]
data.transliteration: Ma lakum la tarjoona lillahiwaqara

data.textUthmani: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
data.wordByWord: وَقَدْ [And indeed] خَلَقَكُمْ [He created you] أَطْوَارًا [(in) stages]
data.transliteration: Waqad khalaqakum atwara

data.textUthmani: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا
data.wordByWord: أَلَمْ [Do not] تَرَوْا۟ [you see] كَيْفَ [how] خَلَقَ [did create] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] سَبْعَ [(the) seven] سَمَـٰوَٰتٍۢ [heavens] طِبَاقًۭا [(in) layers]
data.transliteration: Alam taraw kayfa khalaqa AllahusabAAa samawatin tibaqa

data.textUthmani: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
data.wordByWord: وَجَعَلَ [And made] ٱلْقَمَرَ [the moon] فِيهِنَّ [therein] نُورًۭا [a light] وَجَعَلَ [and made] ٱلشَّمْسَ [the sun] سِرَاجًۭا [a lamp]
data.transliteration: WajaAAala alqamara feehinna nooran wajaAAalaashshamsa siraja

data.textUthmani: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
data.wordByWord: وَٱللَّهُ [And Allah] أَنۢبَتَكُم [has caused you to grow] مِّنَ [from] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] نَبَاتًۭا [(as) a growth]
data.transliteration: Wallahu anbatakum mina al-ardinabata

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] يُعِيدُكُمْ [He will return you] فِيهَا [into it] وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ [and bring you forth] إِخْرَاجًۭا [(a new) bringing forth]
data.transliteration: Thumma yuAAeedukum feehawayukhrijukum ikhraja

data.textUthmani: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
data.wordByWord: وَٱللَّهُ [And Allah] جَعَلَ [made] لَكُمُ [for you] ٱلْأَرْضَ [the earth] بِسَاطًۭا [an expanse]
data.transliteration: Wallahu jaAAala lakumu al-ardabisata

data.textUthmani: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
data.wordByWord: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ [That you may go along] مِنْهَا [therein] سُبُلًۭا [(in) paths] فِجَاجًۭا [wide]
data.transliteration: Litaslukoo minha subulan fijaja

data.textUthmani: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [Said] نُوحٌۭ [Nuh] رَّبِّ [My Lord] إِنَّهُمْ [Indeed, they] عَصَوْنِى [disobeyed me] وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ [and followed] مَن [(the one) who] لَّمْ [(did) not] يَزِدْهُ [increase him] مَالُهُۥ [his wealth] وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ [and his children] إِلَّا [except] خَسَارًۭا [(in) loss]
data.transliteration: Qala noohun rabbi innahum AAasawneewattabaAAoo man lam yazidhu maluhu wawaladuhu illakhasara

data.textUthmani: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
data.wordByWord: وَمَكَرُوا۟ [And they have planned] مَكْرًۭا [a plan] كُبَّارًۭا [great]
data.transliteration: Wamakaroo makran kubbara

data.textUthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
data.wordByWord: وَقَالُوا۟ [And they said] لَا [(Do) not] تَذَرُنَّ [leave] ءَالِهَتَكُمْ [your gods] وَلَا [and (do) not] تَذَرُنَّ [leave] وَدًّۭا [Wadd] وَلَا [and not] سُوَاعًۭا [Suwa] وَلَا [and not] يَغُوثَ [Yaguth] وَيَعُوقَ [and Yauq] وَنَسْرًۭا [and Nasr]
data.transliteration: Waqaloo la tatharunna alihatakumwala tatharunna waddan wala suwaAAanwala yaghootha wayaAAooqa wanasra

data.textUthmani: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلًا
data.wordByWord: وَقَدْ [And indeed] أَضَلُّوا۟ [they have led astray] كَثِيرًۭا ۖ [many] وَلَا [And not] تَزِدِ [increase] ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [the wrongdoers] إِلَّا [except] ضَلَـٰلًۭا [(in) error]
data.transliteration: Waqad adalloo katheeran walatazidi aththalimeena illa dalala

data.textUthmani: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
data.wordByWord: مِّمَّا [Because of] خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ [their sins] أُغْرِقُوا۟ [they were drowned] فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ [then made to enter] نَارًۭا [(the) Fire] فَلَمْ [and not] يَجِدُوا۟ [they found] لَهُم [for themselves] مِّن [from] دُونِ [besides] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] أَنصَارًۭا [any helpers]
data.transliteration: Mimma khatee-atihimoghriqoo faodkhiloo naran falam yajidoo lahum min dooniAllahi ansara

data.textUthmani: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
data.wordByWord: وَقَالَ [And said] نُوحٌۭ [Nuh] رَّبِّ [My Lord] لَا [(Do) not] تَذَرْ [leave] عَلَى [on] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] مِنَ [any] ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ [(of) the disbelievers] دَيَّارًا [(as) an inhabitant]
data.transliteration: Waqala noohun rabbi latathar AAala al-ardi mina alkafireenadayyara

data.textUthmani: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّكَ [Indeed, You] إِن [if] تَذَرْهُمْ [You leave them] يُضِلُّوا۟ [they will mislead] عِبَادَكَ [Your slaves] وَلَا [and not] يَلِدُوٓا۟ [they will beget] إِلَّا [except] فَاجِرًۭا [a wicked] كَفَّارًۭا [a disbeliever]
data.transliteration: Innaka in tatharhum yudillooAAibadaka wala yalidoo illa fajirankaffara

data.textUthmani: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا
data.wordByWord: رَّبِّ [My Lord] ٱغْفِرْ [Forgive] لِى [me] وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ [and my parents] وَلِمَن [and whoever] دَخَلَ [enters] بَيْتِىَ [my house ] مُؤْمِنًۭا [a believer] وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ [and the believing men] وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ [and the believing women] وَلَا [And (do) not] تَزِدِ [increase] ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [the wrongdoers] إِلَّا [except] تَبَارًۢا [(in) destruction]
data.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir lee waliwalidayyawaliman dakhala baytiya mu/minan walilmu/mineena walmu/minatiwala tazidi aththalimeena illatabaran
